about_the_game:
Search for missing people, lost objects, or even help people solve their problems by handing them over their required items. OVERLOOK is hand-drawn, cozy, relaxing, and funny. btw, watch! there might be a cat hidden in bushes.

Let's hang out and talk





OVERLOOK is a zen game about people and other creatures living their lives in different tiny cute places and the game has got Meditative gameplay, perfect for relaxing in nowadays stressful situations.
you could find hidden/ missing objects in the scene by solving mini-puzzles or simply by looking around and finding the object based on the given clues that you have. or you would help people by solving their needs and issues. hand over a cog to the mechanic guy or help to slice an apple using the lumberjack's ax.
or just watching people do their things and just enjoy the relaxing original lo-fi soundtrack of the game.
a satisfying and mysterious world with 50+ delightful hidden surprises to discover with charming hand-drawn animations and unexpected scenarios.
gameplay includes:
  • Solve puzzles by arranging objects.
  • unpack the untold stories

FEATURES:

  • Over 50+ unique characters/ creatures
  • Simple, joyful, quick-to-solve puzzles, and satisfying game-play
  • Intuitive drag and drop controls
  • Original lo-fi Soundtrack
  • Multiple choices to make and multiple outcomes
  • Environmental storytelling
  • Charming all hand-drawn graphics
  • Cute hand-drawn animations
  • Atmospheric sound design
  • feel like a hidden helping hand, a God if you will
  • Mini-scenarios/ pop-culture references/ hidden loot boxes
  • Funny and playful, great for all ages!
